tictactoe.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    Class is responsible for holding the game's board and validating moves.

      • isLegal

        public boolean isLegal(int row,
                       int col)
        Method checks whether a coordinate is within the board.
        Parameters:
        row - Row coordinate
        col - Column coordinate
        Returns:
        true if coordinate is within board, false if coordinate is out of bounds

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree(int row,
                      int col)
        Method checks whether a coordinate is free/unused.
        Parameters:
        row - Row coordinate
        col - Column coordinate
        Returns:
        true if coordinate is free, false if coordinate has been used

      • checkForWin

        public boolean checkForWin(char player,
                           Move latestMove)
        Method checks the current situation on the board for current player's winning streaks.
        Parameters:
        player - Current player's mark (X/O)
        latestMove - Most recent move
        Returns:
        true if a winning streak is found, false if not

      • checkForWinWithMove

        public boolean checkForWinWithMove(char player,
                                   Move latestMove)
        Method checks the current situation on the board for current player's winning streaks.
        Parameters:
        player - Current player's mark (X/O)
        latestMove - Most recent move
        Returns:
        true if a winning streak is found, false if not
